Actions.Name: Insert Entity
Actions.Description: Operation to add an entity to a table.

Actions.Name: Create table
Actions.Description: This operation adds a table to the storage account.

Actions.Name: Get entities
Actions.Description: This operation queries the entities in a table.

Actions.Name: Get entity
Actions.Description: This operation gets the entity in a table based on the partition and row key.

Actions.Name: Get a table
Actions.Description: This operation gets the metadata of a table.

Actions.Name: List tables
Actions.Description: This operation lists the tables in the account.

Actions.Name: Insert or Merge Entity
Actions.Description: Operation to merge data with an entity in a table, creating a new entity if needed.

Actions.Name: Insert or Replace Entity
Actions.Description: Operation to replace an entity in a table, creating a new entity if needed.

Actions.Name: Merge Entity
Actions.Description: Operation to merge data with an entity in a table.

Actions.Name: Replace Entity
Actions.Description: Operation to replace an entity in a table.
